channel.title: The City Lies Beyond These Sands - Sunny [Ambient]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/alwayssunnyinlogan/the-city-lies-beyond-these
Made this with a story in mind about a group of desert fighters returning home, and bringing back a long lost princess. Maybe I'll make the pictures that go with this track one day.
If I recall, this is the first thing I made with RAC Essentials, which is just a loooovely sound pack. Lake is the shizzle.
Kept it tight to the chest for a few months hoping to improve the piano that comes in, but no ideas came to mind. Instead I worked to mix this a bit better, mainly with turning the volume down on the drums so it doesn't overpower the overall ambient vibe.

item.title: The City Lies Beyond These Sands - Sunny [Ambient]
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
Really like this. Great job.
